alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:33PM CDT until July 18 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 433 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fontaine, or near Hoxie, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Bono, Lake City, Bay, Brookland, Caraway, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Cash, Egypt, Walcott, Fontaine, Greenfield, Black Oak, Payneway, Apt, Valley View, Weona Junction and Gum Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
